description: China has unveiled Darwin Monkey, the world’s largest neuromorphic supercomputer. With over 2 billion artificial neurons and 100 billion synapses, it mirrors a macaque brain’s complexity. Designed by Zhejiang University and Zhejiang Lab, the system could accelerate neuroscience simulations and advance artificial general intelligence while consuming only 2,000 watts of power.
title: China Unveils ‘Darwin Monkey’, World’s Largest Neuromorphic Supercomputer

description: The James Webb Space Telescope has unveiled stunning new details of the Butterfly Nebula, a planetary nebula 3,400 light-years away. Using its infrared vision, Webb detected crystalline silicates, large dust grains, and carbon-rich PAH molecules within the nebula’s dusty torus. These discoveries reveal how dying stars recycle minerals and organic compounds, spreading raw materials that seed new stars, planets, and potentially life itself. Reported in Monthly Notices of the Royal Astronomical Society, the findings highlight planetary nebulae as vital factories for planet-building ingredients.
title: James Webb Space Telescope Spots Planet-Building Dust in the Butterfly Nebula

description: NASA is preparing for Artemis II, the first crewed mission to the Moon since Apollo, with a new control hub at Johnson Space Center. The Orion Mission Evaluation Room (MER) will support flight controllers by monitoring Orion’s systems in real time during the 10-day mission. Staffed 24/7, the MER will compare telemetry with expected performance, troubleshoot issues, and coordinate with NASA centers and industry partners. The room features 24 consoles, cutting-edge displays, and engineers from NASA, Lockheed Martin, ESA, and Airbus. This facility ensures astronaut safety while providing critical data for future Artemis lunar missions.
title: NASA’s Orion Control Room Prepares for Artemis II Lunar Mission

description: The crypto market faced fresh pressure on Friday as Bitcoin fell below $112,000 while Ethereum slipped 1.4 percent to $4,452. Altcoins like Solana and BNB gained modestly, while XRP, ADA, and Dogecoin stayed stable. Analysts pointed to rising institutional inflows into Ethereum ETFs and strong momentum for Solana. Meanwhile, the CFTC cleared offshore exchanges to serve US clients, a sign that regulation could tighten. Traders now eye Bitcoin reclaiming $113,000 and Ethereum’s push above $4,700.
title: Bitcoin Dips Below $112,000 Amid Renewed Pressure, Ethereum Hovers Near $4,450

description: Lenovo seems to be gearing up to unveil new products at the upcoming IFA (Internationale FunkAusstellung) tech show in Berlin next month, but leaks have already hinted at what's coming. The tech brand could show off a laptop with a display that rotates from landscape to portrait orientation. It is also said to unveil the Legion Go 2 gaming handheld, two new tablets and three new Motorola smartphones at the tradeshow.
title: Lenovo Tipped to Launch Concept Laptop With Rotating Display, Legion Go 2, More at IFA Berlin Next Week

description: The Department of Telecommunications’ (DoT) Financial Fraud Risk Indicator (FRI) recently blacklisted between 3,00,000 to 4,00,000 SIM cards that were allegedly being used to commit financial fraud, as per a report. Now, another government agency, the Indian Cybercrime Coordination Centre (I4C) has issued a warning regarding an e-SIM fraud, where the bad actors were able to gain access to a victim’s account, even if their UPI and ATM cards were blocked.
title: eSIM Mobile Fraud: I4C Warns Users of eSIM Scams, Shares Tips to Stay Safe

description: Google’s Take a Message feature is rolling out to Pixel 4 and later phones in the US, UK, Ireland, and Australia, with support from most carriers except Dish. Some Pixel 9 users have already received it, and a wider rollout is expected soon. The feature also works on Pixel Watch 2 and later watches when paired with a Pixel 6 or newer phones. It stores messages privately, shows audio and transcriptions in the Phone app's Recents tab, and blocks spam calls automatically.
title: Google Pixel 10's Take a Message Feature Rolls Out to Older Pixel Phones

description: Grok Code Fast 1, a new lightweight coding-focused artificial intelligence (AI) model, was released by xAI on Thursday. The Elon Musk-owned AI startup highlighted that this model comes with agentic capabilities and is designed as a full-stack coding agent that can be used to build both the backend and the front-end of a software.
title: Grok Code Fast 1 With Agentic Coding Capabilities Released; Users Get One Week of Free Access

description: Samsung Galaxy Tab S11 series leaks have been surfacing online for months, hinting at the specifications and features of the upcoming lineup. Recently, Samsung announced that it will hold its Galaxy event on September 4, where the tech giant could unveil the Samsung Galaxy S25 FE, alongside the Galaxy Tab S11 series. Ahead of its supposed launch, the Galaxy Tab S11 series has reportedly been spotted on a Polish retailer’s website, revealing the price and specifications of the tablets.
title: Samsung Galaxy Tab S11 Series Price, Specifications Listed on Retail Websites Ahead of Debut: Report

description: Tecno Pova Slim 5G is confirmed to launch in India on September 4. Flipkart has created a dedicated landing page on its website to tease the arrival of the new phone. It will include Ella and new AI features. It has a dual rear camera setup.
title: Tecno Pova Slim 5G India Launch Date Announced, Will Go on Sale via Flipkart

description: Vivo T4 Pro has gone on sale in India, In addition to instant bank discounts, buyers also get an exchange bonus and no-cost EMI up to six months. Available via the Vivo India e-store, Flipkart, and retail outlets, the phone offers a Snapdragon 7 Gen 4 chipset, 6,500mAh battery with 90W fast charging, and 50-megapixel triple rear cameras with AI tools.
title: Vivo T4 Pro With 50-Megapixel Periscope Camera Goes on Sale in India: Price, Offers

description: Anthropic announced an update to its privacy policy on Thursday, highlighting that it will now train its existing and future artificial intelligence (AI) models on users’ conversations. The San Francisco-based AI company highlighted that it is now giving users an option to either accept or deny this change. This revised policy only affects the end consumers and is not aimed at the enterprise customers of Anthropic.
title: Anthropic Seeks Permission to Train AI Model on User Conversations, Updates Privacy Policy

description: Intel knows that meaningful learning requires more than just a laptop. That’s why it launched Padhai Ka Future, an initiative that brings together the right tools, educational content and real opportunities for growth.
title: Learning in the AI Era: Tools That Actually Help, Not Harm

description: Honor MagicBook 14 (2025) and MagicPad 3 have debuted in select global markets. The MagicPad 3 was first launched in China earlier this year and is now available in the UK, as well. Honor’s new laptop, the MagicBook 14 (2025) sports a 14.6-inch OLED touchscreen with 3,120x2,080 pixel resolution and up to a 120Hz refresh rate.
title: Honor MagicBook Art 14 (2025) With Intel Core Ultra 7 CPU Launched Globally Alongside MagicPad 3: Price, Specifications

description: Ryu Ga Gotoku Studio has announced its annual RGG Summit. The showcase will take place on September 24, just ahead of Tokyo Game Show. The summit will feature announcements on upcoming games from RGG Studio.
title: Like a Dragon Developer Ryu Ga Gotoku Studio Announces RGG Summit for September

description: Google Vids, the company’s new video creation and editing platform, is now available to all users for free. The platform was first introduced in November 2024 to all paid Workspace users. Now, the Mountain View-based tech giant is offering a basic, non-AI version of the platform to those who are on the free tier of the Workspace.
title: Google Vids Is Now Free for Everyone: Here's How to Use It

description: Realme will launch the 15T in India on September 2 at 12pm IST, and it will sell through Flipkart, Realme’s e-store, and offline outlets. The phone will arrive with a textured matte 4R finish and IP66, IP68 and IP69 durability. It will offer a 6.7-inch AMOLED display with 4,000 nits brightness and 2,160Hz PWM dimming rate, 50-megapixel front and rear cameras, AI imaging tools, a 7,000mAh battery, with fast and reverse charging support, and a 6,050 sq mm VC cooling system.
title: Realme 15T India Launch Date Announced; Colourways, Key Features Confirmed

description: Realme GT 8 series is expected to be launched in October with upgrades over last year's Realme GT 7 family. As we wait for the official reveal, a new leak surfaced online suggesting the key specifications of the phones. The new leak corroborates previous rumours about their chipset, display and telephoto camera.
title: Realme GT 8 Series Tipped to Feature Snapdragon 8 Series Chip, 200-Megapixel Telephoto Lens

description: Reliance Industries Limited (RIL) announced JioFrames at the 48th Annual General Meeting (AGM) on Friday. It is a pair of hands-free artificial intelligence (AI)-powered smart glasses that feature a built-in AI voice assistant. There is support for multiple Indian languages, enabling users to converse with the voice assistant in their native language. JioFrames comes with an HD camera, which can be used to take photos and record videos. There are various health and fitness-tracking features as well.
title: RIL 48th AGM 2025: JioFrames With Multi-Language Support Announced as a Hands-Free AI-Powered Companion

description: Reliance Industries Limited (RIL) held its 48th annual general meeting (AGM) on Friday. The company is now bringing a new voice-enabled search assistant called Riya to the platform, which will assist users in content discovery.
title: RIL 48th AGM 2025: JioHotstar Gets Riya Voice Search Assistant, Voice Print Feature for Live Translation of Sports Content

description: At the 48th Annual General Meeting (AGM) on Friday, Reliance Industries Limited (RIL) announced a partnership with Google to establish a Jamnagar Cloud region. Exclusively built for Reliance, it will provide “world-class” AI and compute capabilities powered by Google Cloud in a bid to accelerate AI adoption across RIL’s energy, retail, telecom, and financial services. The Jamnagar Cloud region will leverage clean energy supplied by Reliance and connectivity powered by Jio’s network.
title: RIL 48th AGM 2025: Reliance and Google Announce Holistic Partnership to Accelerate AI Adoption in India

description: Reliance announced new features for its Jio AI Cloud service on Friday. Users will soon be able to search saved photos using voice prompts in their native language, though the full list of supported languages has not yet been confirmed. The AI Create Hub will allow users to turn photos into reels, collages, or promo videos without requiring expertise. Jio AI Cloud will also auto-categorise uploads such as receipts or ID cards. These features are expected to roll out soon, but no specific timeline has been provided.
title: RIL 48th AGM 2025: Reliance Expands Jio AI Cloud With AI Create Hub, New Search and Categorisation Features

description: Reliance Industries Limited (RIL) has announced that it is venturing into building data centres for artificial intelligence (AI) compute with a new dedicated wholly-owned subsidiary called Reliance Intelligence. The Indian conglomerate made the revelation during its 48th Annual General Meeting.
title: RIL 48th AGM 2025: Reliance Intelligence Subsidiary Announced, Company to Build Build AI-Ready Data Centres

description: Reliance Industries Limited (RIL) held its 48th annual general meeting (AGM) on Friday. Amid major announcements such as the announcement of the Jio IPO and Jio Frames smartglasses, the company also unveiled the creation of an unexpected joint venture (JV) with Meta. With this JV, RIL and Meta are collaborating on the artificial intelligence (AI) front, and will together develop enterprise solutions across a wide range of industries.
title: RIL 48th AGM 2025: Reliance, Meta Join Hands to Develop Llama-Powered Agentic Enterprise AI Platforms

description: Google on Wednesday announced a new device protection programme for Made by Google products. As part of this initiative, Pixel and Fitbit device owners in the US will be eligible to receive extended warranty claims and access to priority services. The Mountain View-tech giant is offering common repairs such as screen and battery replacements free of charge on the Pixel 10 series, Pixel Watch 3, Fitbit Charge 6, and other devices in its portfolio.
title: Google Announces Pixel Care+ Programme for Pixel, Fitbit Devices With Free Screen Replacement and Priority Support

description: OpenAI, on Thursday, announced a new artificial intelligence (AI) speech generation model dubbed GPT-Realtime. This is an enterprise-focused model that is capable of native audio generation with low latency, enabling two-way real-time voice conversations. The San Francisco-based AI firm said that compared to its existing voice models, the Realtime model offers higher quality output.
title: OpenAI Introduces GPT-Realtime Speech Generation Model, Makes Realtime API Generally Available

description: Samsung Galaxy Book 5 has been launched in India. The latest AI-powered laptop can be configured with Intel Core Ultra 5 and Core Ultra 7 processors. The Galaxy Book 5 features a 15.6-inch touch screen display and houses a 61.2Wh battery. It comes in two RAM options —16GB and 32GB — and two storage options — 512GB and 1TB.
title: Samsung Galaxy Book 5 With Up to Intel Core Ultra 7 255U CPU, S Pen Support Launched in India

description: Sony has been reported to be working on a gaming handheld that could run PlayStation games natively. A new leak, however, has claimed that the PlayStation parent plans to launch a PS6 handheld that can dock with a TV, just like the Nintendo Switch and Switch 2. The PS6 handheld will reportedly launch alongside the traditional PS6 console.
title: Sony Reportedly Working on Nintendo-Switch Style Hybrid PS6 Handheld With AMD APU

description: WhatsApp launched the Disappearing Messages feature in November 2020. Initially, the company only allowed users to either turn the feature on or off, with the messages getting automatically deleted after seven days. WhatsApp later started rolling out timers for the same, where people could choose to get their messages to disappear as early as 24 hours. Now, the company is reportedly working on offering even shorter timers for disappearing messages.
title: WhatsApp Reportedly Working on Shorter Disappearing Messages Timers

description: Powerbeats Fit will be launched soon, the Apple subsidiary revealed in a YouTube video. The earbuds resemble the Beats Fit Pro, featuring compact in-ear designs with silicone wingtips for a secure fit. It is said to launch in Fall 2025, possibly shortly after Apple’s September 9 iPhone event. The earbuds may share features with the Powerbeats Pro 2, including heart rate sensing, Active Noise Cancellation, and likely a sweat-resistant IP rating.
title: Apple Powerbeats Fit Earbuds Teased With Familiar Design Ahead of Fall 2025 Launch

description: Google Cloud has unveiled the Google Cloud Universal Ledger (GCUL), a new Layer-1 blockchain designed for financial institutions. The platform will support asset tokenisation, cross-border settlements, and Python-based smart contracts, offering a neutral foundation for banks, exchanges, and payment firms. Backed by Google Cloud’s scale, GCUL aims to compete with firms like Circle and Stripe in building institutional-grade blockchain infrastructure.
title: Google Confirms Plans for GCUL Layer-1 Blockchain Project for Financial Institutions

description: Honor Magic V5 was launched in European markets. The book-style foldable comes with a 7.95-inch foldable inner display and a 6.45-inch  cover screen. It is powered by Qualcomm's flagship Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, paired with 16GB of RAM and 512GB of storage. The handset was launched in China in July.
title: Honor Magic V5 With Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC, 5,820mAh Battery Launched Globally: Price, Specifications

description: Microsoft unveiled the company's first two homegrown artificial intelligence (AI) models on Thursday. The foundation models were developed by the Redmond-based tech giant’s AI division, and is said to be built entirely in-house. The first model is MAI-Voice-1, a speech generation model that natively generates expressive and natural sounding voice.
title: Microsoft Unveils Its First Fully Homegrown AI Models; Set to Bring New Features to Copilot

description: The OnePlus 15 specifications have been surfacing online for a while. Expected to succeed last year’s OnePlus 13, the phone has been spotted on the Geekbench benchmarking website with the Snapdragon 8 Elite 2 SoC. This aligns with previous leaks, suggesting the same chipset for the handset. Moreover, the Chinese smartphone maker might not offer a circular rear camera module with the upcoming smartphone.
title: OnePlus 15 With Snapdragon 8 Elite 2 Chipset, Android 16 Listed on Geekbench

description: The Samsung Galaxy A17 5G debuts in India at Rs. 21,999 for the base 6GB+128GB option, with 8GB+128GB and 8GB+256GB variants priced at Rs. 23,499 and Rs. 26,499, respectively. It features a 50-megapixel triple rear camera unit and runs on Exynos 1330 SoC. It ships with One UI 7 based on Android 15 and will get six years of OS and security updates.
title: Samsung Galaxy A17 5G Launched in India With Exynos 1330 SoC, 50-Megapixel Rear Camera: Price, Features

description: Samsung is all set to host a hardware launch event on September 4 to unveil the newest member of the Galaxy S25 series, believed to be the Galaxy S25 FE. Ahead of its launch, promotional material of the purported handset has been leaked, which gives us another look at the handset from all angles. Images also show the handset in all three colour options it is expected to be offered in, once launched.
title: Samsung Galaxy S25 FE Design, Colourways Spotted in Leaked Promotional Images

description: Bharat Sanchar Nigam Limited (BSNL) has announced a special offer on several of its entry-level broadband plans in India, as part of its Bharat Fiber service. As per the state-owned telecom service provider (TSP), customers can avail of discounts on the monthly tariff for three months. Apart from this, they will also be able to enjoy free service for the first month, essentially extending the offer to a total of four months.
title: BSNL Announces Special Offer on Entry-Level Broadband Plans With Discounts, Free One Month Usage

description: The iPhone 17 series is set to be launched at Apple’s “Awe Dropping” event on September 9. Alongside its latest smartphones, the Cupertino-based tech giant is also rumoured to introduce new TechWoven cases as a new accessory. However, it may not be the only one that is announced. As per a tipster, Apple is developing a new Crossbody Strap accessory for the iPhone 17 cases that would function as a way for users to carry the phone across the body.
title: Apple’s Crossbody Strap Accessory for iPhone 17 Cases Leaked; May Use Magnetic Mechanism for Versatility

description: The Poco F7 5G comes equipped with a premium design language that gives a gamer's feel. The handset features flagship-level features and specifications in this price segment, which is a rare thing to find. Check out the review to know more about the latest flagship killer from Poco.
title: Poco F7 5G Long-Term Review: A Gamers' Delight

description: Reliance Industries Limited (RIL) is all set to host its 48th Annual General Meeting (AGM) today, August 29. RIL Chairman and Managing Director Mukesh Ambani is expected to take the stage to provide annual updates on FMCG strategies, the long-awaited Jio IPO, and other projects undertaken by companies under the RIL Group. There are also expectations of announcements related to the expansion of Reliance’s tech stack, including artificial intelligence (AI) initiatives like JioBrain and Jio’s 5G and 6G infrastructure in the telecom sector.
title: RIL 48th AGM 2025 Today: How to Watch LIVE, Expected Announcements

description: Whether you are fond of romcoms or wish to watch a crime thriller, then September is certainly the month. From Aakhon ki Gustaakhiyan to Creepy Horror Wednesday, and crime thriller Inspector Shende, there’s a lot set for release. The streaming will be done on Netflix, Z5, Prime Video, and more.
title: Upcoming OTT Releases in September 2025: Inspector Zende, Maalik, Wednesday Season 2 Part 2, and More
